name: JOHN NAU III
sampleDescriptions: Support funding for American Battlefield Protection program in Interior approps and in DOI FY19 budget; support funding for National Park Foundation in FY19 budget and appropriations for Interior; support passage of Shiloh National Military Battlefield Boundary Adjustment Act HR88/S100; support NPS work on special resource studies at 5 civil rights sites in MS; support work on national recreation area in Texas; support funding for World War 1 memorial.

Support funding for American Battlefield Protection program in Interior approps and in DOI FY19 budget; support funding for National Park Foundation in FY19 budget and appropriations for Interior; support passage of Shiloh National Military Battlefield Boundary Adjustment Act HR88/S100; support NPS work on special resource studies at 5 civil rights sites in MS; support work on national recreation area in Texas; support funding for World War 1 memorial; support Restore America's Park Act.
Support funding for ABPP at NPS and NPF in budget and approps; support Preserving America's Battlefields bill; support Restore Ours Parks Act; support Lone Star NRA.
Support funding for ABPP at NPS, and funding for NPF in budget and approps; support Preserving America's Battlefields bill; support Restore Ours Parks Act; support Lone Star NRA.
